original_text:
They will be gathered together
    as prisoners in a pit;
they will be shut up in a prison,
    and after many days they will be punished.
korean_text: 그들이 죄수가 깊은 옥에 모임 같이 모이게 되고 옥에 갇혔다가 여러 날 후에 형벌을 받을 것이라

sentences.original_text: They will be gathered together as prisoners in a pit
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 구덩이에 죄수로서 함께 모아질 것입니다

sentences.original_text: they will be shut up in a prison
after many days they will be punished
sentences.korean_translation: 여러 날이 지난 후에 그들은 벌을 받게 될 것입니다
